      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method to start allin. This will parse given parameters e.g. input file, output file etc. and start signature process. Furthermore this method prints error message if signing failed. See usage part in README to know how to use it.
        Parameters:
        args - Arguments that will be parsed. See useage part in README for more details.
